attributes.action: reduce the influence religions have on society and general politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religions are dying out - only 8% of the British public actually attend church regularly and yet religions still seem to have an unfair influence on matters such as sexual orientation laws (on the matter of which all religions have proved themselves to be homophobic - which is and should be illegal), science-based education and research and faith schools. Religions must have been made up by somebody at some point (how else could they have been created?) It is time to put a stop to the old-fashioned idea of religion having these unfair influences on matters of great importance. If you agree that ,overall, religion does more harm than good, please sign.
